component.name: MuPDF
component.summary: Lightweight PDF, XPS, and e-book viewer

description.p: MuPDF is a lightweight PDF, XPS, and E-book viewer. It consists of a software library, command line tools, and viewers for various platforms.

The renderer is tailored for high quality anti-aliased graphics and renders text with metrics and spacing accurate to within fractions of a pixel. The viewer is small, fast, yet complete. It supports many document formats, including PDF, XPS, OpenXPS, CBZ, EPUB, and FictionBook 2.
Command line tools allow you to annotate, edit, and convert documents to other formats such as HTML, SVG, PDF, and CBZ.
